name: Mel Gibson Movies Quiz Challenge - How Much Do You Know? |   People Themed

questions.text: 'The Patriot' featured Mel in the American Revolution. Who played his enemy, Lord Cornwallis?
questions.explanation:
Tom Wilkinson.

	Wilkinson got nominated for an Oscar for 'In the Bedroom'.

questions.text: In 'Braveheart' Mel played a hero in Scotland's battle for independence. Unfortunately, the movie took liberty with the truth by portraying another national hero of Scotland as a coward and traitor. Which one?
questions.explanation:
Robert Bruce.

	Bruce is a national hero - talk about bending the facts for the movie!

questions.text: 'What Women Want' had Mel competing with Helen Hunt in business. What type of business was it?
questions.explanation:
Advertising.

	Alan Alda as the boss.

questions.text: 'Gallipoli' again had Mel in combat. In which war?
questions.explanation:
World War I.

	Big battle of WWI.

questions.text: 'The Bounty' was Mel's opportunity to take a shot at the famous mutiny. Who played Bligh?
questions.explanation:
Anthony Hopkins.

	Tone was Christian in the Clark Gable version, which also starred Laughton. Howard was in the Brando version.

questions.text: Mel starred in 'Maverick'. Who was his co-star?
questions.explanation:
Jodie Foster.

	Roberts was in 'Conspiracy Theory'. Hawn was in 'Bird on a Wire'.

questions.text: Which is NOT a Mel Gibson film?
questions.explanation:
The Marrying Man.

	That one stars Alec Baldwin (and Kim Basinger).

questions.text: Mel's movie, 'Ransom', was incorrectly identified by some as a re-make of an earlier movie with the same title. Who starred in that 'Ransom'?
Mel also directs. Which was his first effort?
questions.explanation:
Man Without A Face.

	All are movies that starred Mel.
